name: HTMLTableElement
description: The HTMLTableElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the regular HTMLElement object interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of tables in an HTML document.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.caption
members.description: Is a HTMLTableCaptionElement representing the first <caption> that is a child of the element, or null if none is found. When set, if the object doesn't represent a <caption>, a DOMException with the HierarchyRequestError name is thrown. If a correct object is given, it is inserted in the tree as the first child of this element and the first <caption> that is a child of this element is removed from the tree, if any.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.tHead
members.description: Is a HTMLTableSectionElement representing the first <thead> that is a child of the element, or null if none is found. When set, if the object doesn't represent a <thead>, a DOMException with the HierarchyRequestError name is thrown. If a correct object is given, it is inserted in the tree immediately before the first element that is neither a <caption>, nor a <colgroup>, or as the last child if there is no such element, and the first <thead> that is a child of this element is removed from the tree, if any.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.tFoot
members.description: Is a HTMLTableSectionElement representing the first <tfoot> that is a child of the element, or null if none is found. When set, if the object doesn't represent a <tfoot>, a DOMException with the HierarchyRequestError name is thrown. If a correct object is given, it is inserted in the tree immediately before the first element that is neither a <caption>, a <colgroup>, nor a <thead>, or as the last child if there is no such element, and the first <tfoot> that is a child of this element is removed from the tree, if any.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.rows
members.description: Returns a live HTMLCollection containing all the rows of the element, that is all <tr> that are a child of the element, or a child or one of its <thead>, <tbody> and <tfoot> children. The rows members of a <thead> appear first, in tree order, and those members of a <tbody> last, also in tree order. The HTMLCollection is live and is automatically updated when the HTMLTableElement changes.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.tBodies
members.description: Returns a live HTMLCollection containing all the <tbody> of the element. The HTMLCollection is live and is automatically updated when the HTMLTableElement changes.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.sortable
members.description: Is a Boolean value indicating if the user agent is allowed to provide sorting mechanism for the table, if it supports such a feature. This property reflects the sortable attribute.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.align
members.description: Is a DOMString containing an enumerated value reflecting the align attribute. It indicates the alignment of the element's contents with respect to the surrounding context. The possible values are "left", "right", and "center".

parameters.name: alignment Deprecated since HTML4
parameters.description: alignment is a string with one of the following values: left center right

members.name: HTMLTableElement.bgColor
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the background color of the cells. It reflects the obsolete bgcolor attribute.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.border
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the width in pixels of the border of the table. It reflects the obsolete border attribute.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.cellPadding
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the width in pixels of the horizontal and vertical sapce between cell content and cell borders. It reflects the obsolete cellpadding attribute.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.cellSpacing
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the width in pixels of the horizontal and vertical separation between cells. It reflects the obsolete cellspacing attribute.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.frame
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the type of the external borders of the table. It reflects the obsolete frame attribute and can take one of the following values: "void", "above", "below", "hsides", "vsides", "lhs", "rhs", "box", or "border".

parameters.name: void
parameters.description: no sides. this is the default.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.rules
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the type of the internal borders of the table. It reflects the obsolete rules attribute and can take one of the following values: "none", "groups", "rows", "cols", or "all".

members.name: HTMLTableElement.summary
members.description: Is a DOMString containing a description of the purpose or the structure of the table. It reflects the obsolete summary attribute.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.width
members.description: Is a DOMString containing the length in pixels or in percentage of the desired width fo the entire table. It reflects the obsolete width attribute.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.createTHead()
members.description: Returns an HTMLElement representing the first <thead> that is a child of the element. If none is found, a new one is created and inserted in the tree immediately before the first element that is neither a <caption>, nor a <colgroup>, or as the last child if there is no such element.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.deleteTHead()
members.description: Removes the first <thead> that is a child of the element.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.createTFoot()
members.description: Returns an HTMLElement representing the first <tfoot> that is a child of the element. If none is found, a new one is created and inserted in the tree immediately before the first element that is neither a <caption>, a <colgroup>, nor a <thead>, or as the last child if there is no such element.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.deleteTFoot()
members.description: Removes the first <tfoot> that is a child of the element.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.createCaption()
members.description: Returns an HTMLElement representing the first <caption> that is a child of the element. If none is found, a new one is created and inserted in the tree as the first child of the <table> element.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.deleteCaption()
members.description: Removes the first <caption> that is a child of the element.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.insertRow()
members.description: Returns an HTMLTableRowElement representing a new row of the table. It inserts it in the rows collection immediately before the <tr> element at the given index position. If necessary a <tbody> is created. If the index is -1, the new row is appended to the collection. If the index is smaller than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the collection, a DOMException with the value IndexSizeError is raised.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.deleteRow()
members.description: Removes the row corresponding to the index given in parameter. If the index value is -1 the last row is removed; if it smaller than -1 or greater than the amount of rows in the collection, a DOMException with the value IndexSizeError is raised.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: index is an integer representing the row that should be deleted. However, the special index -1 can be used to remove the very last row of a table.

members.name: HTMLTableElement.stopSorting()
members.description: Removes the sortable attribute to all <th> elements of the table.
